bibl.title: The Roman uraeus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Publication of a marble fragment carved with a uraeus (Salford Museum and Art Gallery, Manchester, Inv. 1865.1501b, h. 13 cm), and discussion of the depiction of the uraeus in the Roman period.
bibl.seg: HARDWICK Tom, The Roman uraeus. Avec résumé en anglais.
Publication of a marble fragment carved with a uraeus (Salford Museum and Art Gallery, Manchester, Inv. 1865.1501b, h. 13 cm), and discussion of the depiction of the uraeus in the Roman period.
